name: dplt
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c0, cdp, c2))

stmt.origin: 3brtr4i(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c0, cdp, c2), cdp2(c0, c1), cdp2(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c0, cdp, c2))
-| wbr(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdp2(c0, c2))
-| wceq(co(c0, cdp, c1), cdp2(c0, c1))
-| wceq(co(c0, cdp, c2), cdp2(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c0, cdp, c2))
-| wbr(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdp2(c0, c2))
-| wceq(co(c0, cdp, c1), cdp2(c0, c1))
-| wceq(co(c0, cdp, c2), cdp2(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wbr(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdp2(c0, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, crp)
-| wcel(c2, crp)
-| wbr(c1, clt, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c0, cdp, c2))
-| wceq(co(c0, cdp, c1), cdp2(c0, c1))
-| wceq(co(c0, cdp, c2), cdp2(c0, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, crp)
-| wcel(c2, crp)
-| wbr(c1, clt, c2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cdp, c1), cdp2(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, crp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c0, cdp, c2))
-| wceq(co(c0, cdp, c2), cdp2(c0, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, crp)
-| wcel(c2, crp)
-| wbr(c1, clt, c2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cdp, c2), cdp2(c0, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c2, crp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c0, cdp, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, crp)
-| wcel(c2, crp)
-| wbr(c1, clt, c2)

comment: Comparing two decimal expansions (equal higher places). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2021.)
